body: This spell functions as the major creation spell, except as noted above and the object created is a semi-real phantasm. Any creature that interacts with the object may make a Will save, with success causing the object to cease to exist. A gnome casting this spell may make a Spellcraft check in place of any Craft check required to make a complex item.
description: This spell functions as the major creation spell, except as noted above and the object created is a semi-real phantasm.
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Gnomes/New Racial Rules/Gnome Spells/Major Phantom Object

effects.text: phantasmal, unattended, nonmagical object, up to 1 cu. ft./level
effects.name: Effect

name: Major Phantom Object
